named-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.updateRetiredFlagById
named-query.query: UPDATE ManyToOneOwner owner SET owner.retired = true WHERE owner.id = :id

named-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.removeById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ManyToOneOwner owner WHERE owner.id = :id

named-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.findByName
named-query.query: SELECT owner FROM ManyToOneOwner owner WHERE owner.name = :ownerName

named-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.findByBirthday
named-query.query: SELECT owner FROM ManyToOneOwner owner WHERE owner.birthday = ?1

named-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.findByOneToManyInverseName
named-query.query: SELECT owner FROM ManyToOneOwner owner INNER JOIN owner.oneToManyInverse inverse WHERE inverse.name = :name

named-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.getName
named-query.query: SELECT owner.name FROM ManyToOneOwner owner WHERE owner.id = :id

named-native-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.getCount
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ManyToOneOwner owner

named-native-query.name: named.dao_ManyToOneOwner.getCountByBloodType
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ManyToOneOwner owner WHERE owner.bloodType = ?1
